eventDecorators.name: LogChangeOwner
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new COMP speed is calculated for a market. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new COMP speed is calculated for a market. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new COMP speed is calculated for a market. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: implementation
parameterDecorators.description: The new subToken implementation*.

parameterDecorators.name: proxy
parameterDecorators.description: The variable debt token proxy address.

parameterDecorators.name: secret
parameterDecorators.description: key chosen by the first player.

parameterDecorators.name: move
parameterDecorators.description: first players move.

parameterDecorators.name: player
parameterDecorators.description: players address.

functionDecorators.name: joinTheGame
functionDecorators.description: This is where second player joins the game.

parameterDecorators.name: gameKey
parameterDecorators.description: key of the game to join.

functionDecorators.name: makeSecondMove
functionDecorators.description: This is where second player makes his move. Making move seperated from "joinTheGame" to avoid "racing" scenario: first player sees second players "wining" transaction and decides to join the game as a second player with higher amount of gas.

parameterDecorators.name: gameKey
parameterDecorators.description: key of the game to join.

parameterDecorators.name: move
parameterDecorators.description: second players move.

functionDecorators.name: play
functionDecorators.description: This is where first player inputs his secret to find out the winner.

parameterDecorators.name: secret
parameterDecorators.description: secret used in the "game key" generation process.

parameterDecorators.name: move
parameterDecorators.description: first players move used in the "game key" generation process.

functionDecorators.name: reportFailedGame
functionDecorators.description: This is where first player can end the game after closingTime is over.

parameterDecorators.name: secret
parameterDecorators.description: secret used in the "game key" generation process.

parameterDecorators.name: move
parameterDecorators.description: first players move used in the "game key" generation process.

functionDecorators.name: reportPlayer1
functionDecorators.description: This is where second player can claim his win after (closingTime + 2 * closingTimeOffset) is over.

parameterDecorators.name: gameKey
parameterDecorators.description: game key.

functionDecorators.name: reportPlayer2
functionDecorators.description: This is where first player can claim his win after (closingTime + closingTimeOffset) is over.

parameterDecorators.name: secret
parameterDecorators.description: secret used in the "game key" generation process.

parameterDecorators.name: move
parameterDecorators.description: first players move used in the "game key" generation process.

functionDecorators.name: startTheGame
functionDecorators.description: This is where the first player creates the game.

parameterDecorators.name: gameKey
parameterDecorators.description: key generated in generateKey function.

parameterDecorators.name: bet
parameterDecorators.description: amount of money needed to join the game.

parameterDecorators.name: closingTime
parameterDecorators.description: duration of the time in milliseconds after which game will be closed for betting.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: This is where players can withdraw their funds.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: amount of wei to withdraw.
